personal.name: Manjunatha C
personal.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
personal.subtitle: 11+ Years of Frontend Excellence
personal.bio: Passionate Senior Frontend Engineer with over 11 years of experience building scalable web applications using React and Angular. Specialized in performance optimization, accessibility, and design systems. Led cross-functional teams and mentored junior developers while delivering high-impact technical solutions.
personal.longBio:
I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer with a deep passion for creating exceptional user experiences through modern web technologies. With over 11 years in the industry, I've mastered the React and Angular ecosystems, focusing on performance optimization, accessibility standards, and scalable design systems.

My journey spans from individual contributor to technical leader, where I've successfully delivered 50+ projects, mentored 20+ developers, and established frontend best practices across multiple organizations. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating components that not only function perfectly but also delight users with smooth animations and intuitive interactions.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source projects, writing technical blogs, or speaking at frontend conferences about performance optimization and modern development practices.

achievements: Led frontend architecture for 10+ enterprise applications
Reduced bundle sizes by 60% through advanced optimization techniques
Established accessibility standards achieving WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
Built component libraries used by 100+ developers across organization
Mentored 20+ junior developers with 95% retention rate
Spoke at 5 frontend conferences on performance optimization
Contributed to 15+ open source projects with 1000+ GitHub stars
